rule: If multiple model names are found, each must be individually enclosed in double quotation marks within the array.
input: Abstract: Our prediction system, SmartPredictor, is an extension of TrendExtractor.
complianceText:
The chatbot's description specifies that the output should be an array of model names in the format `["model_name"]` extracted from the abstract. If there are no model names, the expected output should be `["NA"]`. In this case, the output provided is `["SmartPredictor", "TrendExtractor"]`, which complies with the specified format of an array. There is no way to assess whether these names were present in the abstract, hence the output is compliant with the description without knowing the input.

No violation.
OK
